explains: n. 平民；自费学生；下议院议员

sentences.en: In 1959, Akihito broke with imperial tradition by marrying a commoner.
sentences.cn: 1959年,明仁天皇打破皇室传统,与一个平民结了婚。

sentences.en: It's only the second time a potential heir to the throne has married a commoner.
sentences.cn: 这只是第二次王储与平民结婚。

sentences.en: He was born a commoner, albeit into a wealthy Transylvanian family.
sentences.cn: 他出生平民，尽管是生于一个富裕的特兰西瓦尼亚家庭。
